A Champagne Reception
Join us as we celebrate the newly released Limited Edition of Perrier-Jouët Belle Epoque 2007 created by Cellar Master Hervé Deschamps and design duo Mischer'Traxler. Combining sights, sounds and aromas, we've created a sensorial journey for you to get an exclusive taste of this exceptional vintage.
Join us on 10th May - tickets are limited.
Sign up now <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGN_BRN_16_PJ_NL_April.html]]>
